General.Name: Life Stem Genetics
General.Description: Life Stem Genetics Inc., a development stage company, focuses on establishing stem cell therapy based clinics worldwide. Its products and services include nutraceutical and medical supplements, and IV nutritional cocktails; stem cell banking services; stem cell treatments for degenerative conditions, hyperbaric oxygen therapy, cancer treatments, and weight loss; anti-aging stem cell therapy; anti-viral therapy; and adistem stem cell treatments for orthopedics, neurological, and lung diseases. Life Stem Genetics Inc. has a strategic collaborative agreement with American CryoStem Corporation. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Beverly Hills, California.
General.Address: 433 North Camden Drive, Beverly Hills, CA, United States, 90210
